text: On computers using graphics for an interface, a tab is a way to switch between different controls (such as in a configuration screen), or documents (such as in a web browser or word processor). Only one tab can be active at a time. == Use in browsers == More recently tabs have become a popular feature of most web browsers. This allows you to have more than one website open in the same window. ==Related pages== *Tabbed Document Interface == Other websites == * Navigation and Module tabs at the Yahoo! Design Pattern Library. * Yahoo! UI Library TabView * ASP.NET AJAX Control Toolkit * Scriptaculous AJAX tabs Category:Computers
title: Tab (GUI)
